Name: Chatham Hotel Special
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: We've slightly changed the proportions and replaced the original lemon zest garnish with a little extra spice.
History: This mid-1900s classic from New York's Chatham Hotel was resurrected by Ted Haigh in his 2004 book Vintage Spirits & Forgotten Cocktails .
Nutrition: One serving of Chatham Hotel Special contains 247 calories
